DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myToolTip: Release a bomb on a named target
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Execute a call for Close Air Support (CAS) using 9-line brief parameters to engage a named target.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName></myVariableName> <myType>separator</myType> <myLabel>9-Line</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

Initial Point</myLabel> <myToolTip>Also refered to as the Battle Position.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

Heading</myLabel> <myToolTip>The heading from the IP to TGT in degrees magnetic. This parameter does not affect flight.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>offset</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Offset: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Offset direction inidcates the side of the IP target line to attacking aircraft can manoeuvre to position itself for the attack.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>none</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>none;left;right</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

Distance</myLabel> <myToolTip>The distance to the target. This parameter does not affect flight.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetName</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>4-6. Target</myLabel> <myToolTip>Provides the name of the target to hit. The location is calcuated. For automatic attacks the description is not needed. </myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Points</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter;DtPointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

Mark Type: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Describe the type of mark used on the target. This parameter is not used.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

If entered, some entity must be designating the target with a laser of this code.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>altitude</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Bombing Altitude: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Choose to stay at the current altitude or use the aircraft maximum altitude when dropping a bomb.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>use current</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>use maximum;use current</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
